column2:
"I have put you through much trouble. You really are
a first-class partizan user."

"I trust you found those Gwanadas to be quite
formidable foes."

"Now I want you to use what you've learned here
in your coming missions. Don't let it go to waste."

"ご苦労だった。君もすっかり
一流のパルチザン使いだな。"
"だがグワナーダはしぶとかっただろう？"

"今回の特訓で経験したことを
忘れることなく
今後の任務に活かしてくれたまえ！"
